values:
instead of being active in my choices, i feel myself starting to find my old ways popping up again.
and the same things are happening- i'm just not upset about them.
i think i was once upset for a reason.
but now why is it not bothering me.
i do get sad, and mad.
but those feelings f a d e.
then here i lay,
complacent... and

 n u m b.

before guitar hero, the song "Freebird" always reminded me of the scene in Forrest Gump where Jenny contimplates suicide off of the balcony. It always kind of scared me.
now, i just see myself wailing on a nice riff.

thank you Guitar Hero II

i need to replace the valves on my transmission.
price tag- $1292 and change.
fucking mother fucker.
i just paid off that fucking car.
i've had it for 6 months and it's allready giving me shit.
and my credit card is misspelled.
i can't do this anymore.
i can't always be the one pa ying for everything

Zig ate a pair of my fave undies.
Raplh's Juice Bar
Come Give Us A Squeeze

it must be a week of lossed underwear

that was the first geniunely happy statement i heard from him after something like that in awhile.
i'm getting the distinct impression he's happy i'm back.
but i'm not letting my hope's get too high.
i'm happy that i'm happy right now, even dispite the uncomfort.
i'm not happy because oh what i think may happen in the future.

progress!! hoorah!

i don't want this giant snowstorm to happen and i'm not afraid to say it.
it seems like there's a lot of hype about this storm.
hopefully everything works out for the best.

I'm with you on this one, brianna.
i'm tired of this shit.

we've made the long treck to boston.
here's to family.

i think i might like where we are.
others might not.
but for now, i'm happy.

winter struck. softly.
so tonight kind of fell through.
then we went to cosmic bowling
watched a knife fight happen.
then came come
because of fear.
cause we're little white girls.
i'm flippin' tired.
of it.

i don't know what is up with my dreams lately.
i remember every detail.
and they determine my mood for the entire day.
i'm constantly distracted.
and i feel people being bored with me when i talk about him over and over.
i just can't get him out of my head.
how many times can i say that damn sentence.
as always, at least one more.

i feel an itch.
in a plethra of ways.
it's weird that my dream forshadows the days events yesterday.
but it's brought to mind a lot more questions that i tried to sufficate.
i think collin hay said it best.
"i just don't think i'll ever get over you"

i love my family
i'm happy i finally realized this.
they're your friends for life.
they actually care about you.
and yeah, they're crazy.
but that's character.
people get pissed off at innocent mistakes
people turn their backs on others that need them
people also ignored friends that are there to help you
family doesn't do that

friday was a lot of fun.
next next week,i'm going down to newburgh to meet brandon's crew.
i'm pretty excited
yesterday was truly a "a nice day"
and it didn't matter that i didn't hang out with anyone
i planned on it, but things happened and then i didn't
and i'm not bothered by it.

today though, whitney- you and i shall have a blast.
if anyone wants to join us, gimme a call

i decided. i'm no longer going to live life assuming that i'll grow old.
it doesn't happen to everyone.
if you're lucky, you will.
luck is not my forte

seriously. what the fuck.
ciggarettes aren't eating me alive.
my train of thought is.
oh train.
can't even use that word without thinking about it.
when will these triggers stop firing?

the weirdest stuff is on tv now.
on fox.
a barber shop quartet is singing about homosexual experiences.
this is so odd.
but pretty funny.

anywho. went to pizza hut and bowling and flea marketing in ellenville with leslie, brianna and whitney.
i'ma miss them like woah next year.
don't know how i'm going to make it without them, actually.
it's not like i have college friends i can hang out with.

and i'm not going to have sex in a long time.
what the fuck is the deal with that.

and he kissed me goodbye. i'm going to miss him so much.
i'm not ready to let go.
this is going to be a rough few months.

i'm very self-involved
and for that i appologize.

last night was a lot of fun.

i feel like a pinball table.
or something that bounces around a lot.
and i can't seem to pinpoint how i feel.
i want him back, but just for comfort? i don't know
i loved him, yeah,
but new people are, as steve said, "exciting."
and i'm "testing the waters" but i don't really see it like that.
everytime i've explored, it was an odd, kind of in the moment thing.
and each time, right after i do, the next day or so i'd regret it.
and nothing ever came from it again.

is that what the rest of my life is going to be like?
and why does it seem that, with liam, all i want to do is destroy myself.

fuckermotherfuck fucker.

if i keep this up, i'll be worldly before you know it.

... this could be dangerous.
i love allie and our antics. :-)

everyone is coming home and i love it.
i just hurt myself extremely by doing yoga in jeans. ouchies!
hopefully the drama will settle soon.

i did. and i'm not sure how i feel about it just yet.

omg this is so weird.

life
what have you done to me
most of my classes this semester were amazing. but english- why do you torment me so? actually, why do i let myself suck at taking this class. it honestly is not challenging. i just put it off and put it off hoping it will magically accomplish itself. when really- i feel like the past few months, my life has been happening- but i'm not in on it. i've reestablished friendships that i had let fade in the past. and i cherrish them- but still i find myself longing for what i had. even today, i just can't believe that it's over. i don't feel like i'm still "in love" exactly. but i wish i could call his house, see his brothers, go to his basketball games, even talk to his parents. i still think about him everyday and before i go to sleep.
i want him out of my mind, or back in my heart. one or the other.

work has been so slow and so- challenging. i seem to need to proove myself to people i've known basically all my life. and i feel like they all think i'm inferior to them. maybe i am. i don't know. at least i may make it through college.

i like that i can be friends with steve and leslie and chance and that whole crew that i admired all through high school and wasn't really part of. i'm glad to be here. :-)

today was my last monday classes ever. art history est fini and drawing and comp is over with. it's really quite sad. i love my class- classes this year. i just hate english.
i have 4 assignments to make up in drawing.
and 3 to do in english.
doable.

christmas shopping was finished up yesterday. and i really enjoyed the play. I think I'll rent "The Philadelphia Story" tonight. perhaps, perhaps.

I think I may be having a second wind.

i'm so tired. i had fun last night. except the whole 5:30 drama shit.
i need to write two papers today/tomorrow.

i can do this.

i need sleep, but i'm never gonna get it.

i have the apartment to myselt and that's kind of cool.
roxy and quincy and i are in charge.
yesterday was the museum of science and the bodies exhibit.
it was pretty friggin cool
i almost wish i didn't push myself to see the babies.
i'm sorry, "fetuses."
but it was still very interesting.
after that we met up with marsha and charles and went out to eat at a pretty sweet place called "common ground."
when i bring people up that might be where we go cause it's cheap and awesome.

now the rest of them are out to breakfast and i wasn't hungry enough and the resturant is small enough that i was encouraged to stay home. which is cool. i'm not exactly suitable for public just yet.

hittin up the boston streets then on our way home around 12. sounds good, eh?

see ya'll at 4.

...make me happy.



the kiss knocked him out of the shot.

so does The Green Mile- well, not happy, exactly, because it is so sad, but it's such a good movie.
all i saw today was ass and titties, but what evs.
and i'm happy. woot woot.
i loooooooooooove today. and for no special reason either.

yup- as an artist, you need to be able to draw a naked body.
so today we drew Ray Cox, no joke.
For three hours, the man stood there, with everything hanging out.
And seriously, it was only uncomfortable for like 10 minutes.
then it became second nature to see his twig and berries just chillin there.
today marks the beginging of the end of the semester.

wish me luck.

a whole weekend here and you didn't see me once.
thanks.
appreciated.
hope you had fun, though.

my room is halfway to livable
lets see if i can keep it this way this time.

brighter side:
i'm back in the game, bitches.

last night and this whole weekend has been a blast.
especially today :-)
i have high hopes, pun unintentional.
i like my friends who i hang out with.
and even some i don't, but wish i did.
ah whatevs. i'm a dormat. and an annoying person to watch a movie with.
i act ghetto and i'm not.
it's just how i talk.
but i understand i say "mad" and "shit" too much and it sounds funny coming out of me.
it's just how i roll, aiight?
it's easier to type like that too.
it feels more natural for me to talk like that for some reason.

no clue what's going on.

so last night was a get together at my house which i thuroughly enjoyed.
and it was also thanksgiving.
so i am giving thanks.
for my amazing friends.
because i love them
and i'm quite proud of myself.
for being a stand-up individual.
at least trying to be.
teena is family.
so i'm in one of those moods that you can't really decide what it is.
"we" watched The Break Up  last night.
i cried.
because i am a less cute version of Jennifer Aniston without the balls.
i didn't want to end up like this, but i did. 
so i need to make the best of it.
that movie was written so real.
i've argued like that countless times- the only difference being he didn't care at all.
it's time to find someone who cares.
maybe i'll find that person at sam's tonight.
or at least someone to have fun with.

god i sound slutty

i keep my promises. lol
i like kiss kiss bang bang, even though we didn't get to the end.
and gilmore- i don't know- i expected more.
and veronica mars was hottt.
and brianna is tres awesome.
and my allie is home.
and i had a horrible nightmare last night.
that won't escape my mind.
i am at least thinking about moving on.
but not actually doing it, really.
but thinking about it is better than not thinking about it.
thanksgiving- i should give thanks.

fuck yeah.
i had a good time.
i hope ya'll did, too.

and steve.
i want to see that film developed real soon.

Type your cut contents here.

what's that? contents. I wish i was empty.

ket's make that nothing to say.
things are ok.
that's good.
i like friends.
i wish i was magic.
and could make people love.
or stop loving.
one or the other, if not both.

Ben.
all i have to say.
he rocks me so hard.
i loose all self-conciousness because of him.

:-)

we are about to embark on our journey to three of my loves.
yay.
wish me luck, i'm gonna need it.
ben, baby, i'm on my way.

even though i got made fun of cause my galoshes and umbrella match (i don't care i think it's hott)
and it rained all day
and i had the weirdest dream last night that i will never describe to anyone.
i got a wake up phone call.
i missed them.
today was good.

i need to talk to you about tomorrow.
why are you asleep.
why do i not know what's happening.
why do i ask questions that i know will never be answered.

and why do i want you to want me?
and other things mentioned in "cheap trick"'s song.

jeeze.

it's on the radio right now.
and i tried to escape from it.
but how long can i hide in the bathroom for?
so i came out.
and damnit, he's so over it and i'm so not. 


i give up.

i love marie antoinette.
even though the ending was over my head.
i love kirsten dunst.
and jason schwartzman.
and rip torn.
and the clothes.
and the shoes.
and the parties.
and the cake.
and everything else.

except the asshole older gentleman that shushed us when we weren't even being that loud. wtf. i whisper through movies, it's what i do and it was his choice to sit almost directly in front of us and have the nerve to say we should move. whatever.

anywho. nice weekend.

Miss Jones taught me English 

But I think I just shot her son 

'Cause he owed me money 

With a bullet in the chest you cannot run 

Now he's bleeding in a vacant lot 

The one in the summer where we used to smoke pot 

I guess I didn't mean it 

But man, you shoulda seen it 

His flesh explode 



Slow motion see me let go 

We tend to die young 

Slow motion see me let go 

What a brother knows 

Slow motion see me let go 



Now the cops will get me 

But girl, if you would let me 

I'll take your pants off 

I got a little bit of blow we could both get off 

Later bathing in the afterglow 

Two lines of coke I cut with Drano 

And her nose starts to bleed 

A most beautiful ruby red 



Slow motion see me let go 

We'll remember these days 

Slow motion see me let go 

Urban life decays 

Slow motion see me let go 



And at home 

My sister's eating paint chips again 

Maybe that's why she's insane 

I shut the door to her moaning 

And I shoot smack in my veins 

Wouldn't you? 

See my neighbor's beating his wife 

Because he hates his life 

There's a knock to his fist as he swings 

Oh man, what a beautiful thing 

And death slides close to me 

Won't grow old to be 

A junkie wino creep 

Hollywood glamorized my wrath 

I'm a young urban psychopath 

I incite murder for your entertainment 

'Cause I needed the money 

What's your excuse? 

The joke's on you 



Slow motion see me let go 

Oh yeah 

Slow motion see me let go 

Slow motion see me let go

drinko is the shit
allie is the shit
nicole is the shit
my mom is the shit
malibu is the shit
nachos are the shit
goooooooooooooood shit

i feel boring.
but i like it.
and i wish he would-
nevermind
i don't want to talk about him unless things change.
which i hope will.
soon
cause i- i just can't take it.

i don't know what i'm thinking.
i just know i don't like things the way they are.

Demetri didn't die, but he slayed me. There were points when I thought I was going to die from laughing, well maybe not die, but get really toned abs.

it was pretty fucking sweet.


not to mention saturday. which was fun. although i thought i lost my cell phone for most the night so that's all i was thinking about. and my missing bowl. and the groping.

otherwise it was AOK.

And friday's costume ball was pretty sweet too.

allright- peace

leslie is awesome.
because she wrote me this:
'ode to be'
Locked InThePark: you are not as smelly as your french namesake
Locked InThePark: that's the whole poem
FormerNormaJeane: i love it
FormerNormaJeane: i had to pause it in it's glory
Locked InThePark: hehe

today is brianna's birthday.
and today feels good.
and this weekend will be, oh what's that? AMAZING!!!!
because friday is maybe getting sara and definetly the legend costume ball.
saturday is work and then, fun time.
sunday is amazing field trip with leslie to albany and st rose and, oh yeah DEMETRI MARTIN
so friggin excited.
i'm feelin' good.
